update t_pay_request
trade_status = #{tradeStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
total_num = #{totalNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
success_num = #{successNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fail_num = #{failNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where task_code = #{taskCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and business_date = #{businessDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select business_date from t_pay_request where str_to_date(#{businessDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y%m%d') > str_to_date(business_date,'%Y%m%d') ORDER BY id DESC limit 1
